tweet.html: RT @FSIatState: (1/3) During outbreaks of infectious disease, an important function of 19th century diplomats was to report the status of U.S. citizens. An early example of this is the cholera outbreak across the Ottoman Empire in the late 1800s. #FRUS #FSIatHome 📷: @nlm_news
